bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Some jobs do not transition back from warning to running
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
The way the new condition's calculation that was introduced in v1.1.2 in the operator does not take into account recent transitions. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
We should think about a better heuristic to categorize the operations' states without storing every change.
